name: MovingLake
headline: Realtime Data Connectors
description: MovingLake is Fivetran for event-driven architectures. Companies such as Casai use our product to obtain orders and price changes in real time.

founders.name: Andres Paez, Founder
founders.description: Worked as a Software Engineer and Product Manager at Amazon Prime, Google Search and Google Cloud Platform for about 7 years. Have worked as the CTO of Casai and Valoreo for the last 3 years starting technology teams from scratch leading software engineers, hardware engineers, software managers, data engineers, data scientists, IT professionals, DevOps engineers, product managers and product designers.

founders.name: Edgar Cabrera, Founder
founders.description: About ten years of Sofware Engineer Experience at startups of several stages. I have worked in developing products from scratch until they become scalable, robust systems. I love the feeling of my work bringing value to others.

# Enterprise API Integrations
ERPs, CRMs, PMS, RMS, *MS systems, we have the most reliable integrations in the market
Get Started
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/631058b4dc4b6466acf1962e_api-conections.png)
### The #1 real time API integration company. A Y Combinator backed business.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/62d9c9fbd570dd2f4c5325e4_ycombinator-no-whitespace.png)](https://movinglake.com/<http:/ycombinator.com>)
## entire integration In One Connector
Updates flowing in real time to your backend, ERPs, CRMs as well as to your databases, datalakes, data warehouses and message queues!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/630af4c4ef12217154640ab4_wrok-icon-1.png)
### Easy to Use
Easy to follow setup guide to get your connectors up and running in little to no time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/630af4c5ef1221632b640ab5_wrok-icon-2.png)
### Fan Out Events
Push your data from a single platform to all of your downstream services, dependencies and data repositories.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/630af4c5463af558656f546f_wrok-icon-3.png)
### Event-driven Architecture
Natively thought of to support event-driven architectures. Leave the scheduler hassles to us!
**TESTIMONIAL**
##  Here's what our customers say
Miguel Magos
VP of Data at Casai
# A Sync That Never Sleeps
MovingLake is always syncing, so there's never more than a minute or so of drift between the APIs and / or databases.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/6318be05001fa47219441a41_moving-lake-diagram.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/630c342b8b959e3360f1d738_advert-bg.png)
**CHOOSE FROM OUR**
# Pull-to-PushAPI Connectors
Easily replay any failed or missed events. Configure back-off, jitter and dead-letter behaviors. With an optional deduplication system to avoid sending any event more than once. Get your data transformed and ready to analyze in your preferred data repositories.
  1. ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/630c35de57c56a5edf2ca74b_check.png)
**The #1 real-time API connector company**
  2. ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/630c35de57c56a5edf2ca74b_check.png)
**Enterprise API integrations**
  3. ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/630c35de57c56a5edf2ca74b_check.png)
**Community support**


**CONNECT YOUR DATA**
# Get the Data where it needs to
Ensure your company is running with up-to-date data everywhere. Remove data silos and integrate every system with each other. No more stale data.
Get Started
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/630c3432f3891dd8dccd68eb_advert-bg1.png)
# **SETUP IN MINUTES**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/63184542afae5adf085b7e8e_Screen%20Shot%202022-09-01%20at%201.17.31%20PM%20\(1\).png)
#  1 - Select the API
Choose the API(s) you want to integrate from our constantly expanding catalog.
[**View sources**](https://movinglake.com/</realtime-connectors>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/6320db4d82fee69b669f118d_Screen%20Shot%202022-09-13%20at%202.34.21%20PM.png)
# 2 - Map your data
Select the entities or endpoints you want to sync. All already configure with webhooks, if any. Override the polling frequency for any.
[**View sources**](https://movinglake.com/</realtime-connectors>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b38a8189679484db3ca58f/6320dbc01c8ffb56a2a0ca4f_Screen%20Shot%202022-09-13%20at%202.36.19%20PM.png)
# 3 - Connect your database
Sync directly to your production database. Or try a hosted demo database to take MovingLake for a spin.
[**View Destinations**](https://movinglake.com/</destinations>)
## Simplified Payment
#### You'll always know how much our integrations will cost you. Flat monthly fee for simplicity of everyone involved.

generated_description:
### MovingLake: Real-Time Data Connectors for the Modern Era

**Overview**  
Founded in 2022 and hailing from Mexico City, MovingLake is an exciting startup that positions itself as "Fivetran for event-driven architectures." With a core mission to provide real-time data connectors, they help businesses like Casai streamline their operations by fetching orders and price changes instantly.

**Y Combinator Backed**  
Part of Y Combinator's Summer 2022 batch, this small but mighty team of three is on a mission to tackle the complexities of data integration with simplicity and efficiency.

**Key Features and Offerings**  
MovingLake specializes in:
- **Real-Time API Integrations**: They offer connectors for ERPs, CRMs, and various other systems, ensuring data flows without interruption.
- **User-Friendly Setup**: The platform allows users to connect their data in just minutes, bypassing traditional, cumbersome installation hurdles.
- **Event-Driven Architecture**: Designed to support real-time updates, MovingLake eliminates scheduling headaches, allowing data to push from a single source to multiple downstream applications effortlessly.
  
**Industries Served**  
Their product primarily caters to sectors such as:
- **E-Commerce**
- **Hospitality**
- **Telecommunications**
- **Insurance**
- **Food & Beverage**

Each of these industries benefits from a seamless integration of data, helping businesses make informed decisions based on the most current information available.

**Testimonials and Market Position**  
MovingLake has earned positive feedback from customers, notably Miguel Magos, VP of Data at Casai, who appreciates the near-instantaneous synchronization capabilities, stating, “A Sync That Never Sleeps.”

**Pricing Model**  
For businesses concerned about budgets, MovingLake offers a straightforward flat monthly fee for their integrations—ensuring that there are no hidden surprises when it comes to costs.

**How to Get Started?**  
Getting connected involves a three-step process:
1. **Select the APIs** from an expanding catalog.
2. **Map your data** by choosing entities or endpoints.
3. **Sync with your database**, either a production environment or a demo.

**Connect with MovingLake**  
Curious about enhancing your data architecture? Visit [MovingLake's website](https://movinglake.com) to explore their offerings and see how they can transform your data management.

In essence, if you're looking for a reliable, real-time connection solution that prioritizes ease of use and effectiveness, MovingLake might just be the partner you need.
